page.title: 19A working day.
page.content: I get up about 10 o'clock.I get dressed and go downstairs for my breakfast after which I go back up stairs for a long soak in the bath. After this its helping with the house work.At 11,30 if its fine I check around the garden.Afted 99hat I go to the garage to get the car out,check the level of all fluids,check lights wrk ready for the days use. 12.30,its dinner time. Only a light snack,as we have a cooked meal at night.After dinner my wife makes a cooked meal for about 5 o'clock after which we sit down,watch t.v.or potter about the house.About 7.30 it's time to get ready for work.If you haue not guessed I work night.At 8 pm l leave for work.I call 3 other men and take them to the factory in Oxford,Austin Rover,work'til 7.30p.m.
